mapper.select: select dic_id, dic_name, dic_key, dic_value, dic_code, color, order_number, remark from dic
select dic_id, dic_name, dic_key, dic_value, dic_code, color, order_number, remark from dic where dic_name = #{dicName} and dic_key = #{dicKey}
mapper.insert: insert into dic(dic_name, dic_key, dic_value, dic_code, color, order_number, remark) values (#{dicName}, #{dicKey}, #{dicValue}, #{dicCode}, #{color}, #{orderNumber}, #{remark})
mapper.update: update dic set dic_name = #{dicName}, dic_key = #{dicKey}, dic_value = #{dicValue}, dic_code = #{dicCode}, color = #{color}, order_number = #{orderNumber}, remark = #{remark} where dic_id = #{dicId}
